SQLDataSource.Author: EntChathI
SQLDataSource.Name: C_EA_WO_Without_Inv_Preview
SQLDataSource.Where:
(&AO.Sc_Service_Contract_Api.Get_Contract_Type(CONTRACT_ID) LIKE NVL('$CONTRACT TYPE$', '%') OR '$CONTRACT TYPE$'= '%' OR '$CONTRACT TYPE$' IS NULL) AND CONTRACT like NVL('$CONTRACT$','%') AND &AO.COMPANY_SITE_API.get_Company(CONTRACT) like NVL('$COMPANY$','%') AND STATE = 'Reported'
AND &AO.C_EA_Customization_Util_API.Check_Inv_Preview(wo_no)='TRUE'
